name: Black Dreams (itch)
description:
"Reality is the playground of our dreams"

Dream

You find yourself in a person's subconscious mind as they sleep. It's calm. Peaceful. Quiet. But things are not always what they appear to be...

Discover

Day turns to night. Light turns to shadow. Dreams slowly become nightmares. Unravel the story. Escape your dreams. Wake up.

Realize

What have you done while awake to deserve such terrible nightmares? Only one way to find out...


Black Dreams is a short horror game taking place in a persons dreams. It focuses more on atmosphere and story than cheap scares.
